mapper.select:
select fno,title,views,cre_dt from freeboard order by
title views fno
asc desc
limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
mapper.delete: delete from freeboard where fno=#{no} and (pwd is null or pwd=#{password})
mapper.update: update freeboard set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, cre_dt=now() where fno=#{fno} and (pwd is null or pwd=#{password})
